vector-skin-desc:
Bɔmi 2 Vector niŋgbuna
 
* 2011- monobook taɣibu din daa kana la daa mali nina polo taɣibu pam ni di zaŋ tum tuma. 

* 2022 Vector daa mɛ mi pahi WMF [[mw:Desktop Improvements]] tumanima .
prefs-vector-enable-vector-1-help:
Yuma din be tooni kanna, ti nyɛla ban yɛn kpaŋsiri vector nahiŋgbana ŋɔ. Vector fali ŋɔ ni che ka a tooi nyari yɛlikura zaŋ kpa vector (as of December 2019). A yi bɔri ni a deei baŋsim zaŋ kpa bee ninneesim, nyin yoomi [[mw
:Reading/Web/Desktop_Improvements|project page]].
vector-opt-out: Yihi ŋa labisi din di be shɛm ni
vector-opt-out-tooltip: Taɣimi a seetibu n-labisi din di pun be shɛm ni (legacy Victor)
vector-language-button-aria-label: Kpemi lahabali bali sheli ni. Din be {{PLURAL:$1|$1 Balli |$1 Bala}}
vector-no-language-button-aria-label: Lala atikili ŋɔ maa kuli bela lala zuliya ŋɔ ni ko. Che lala atikili ŋɔ kpe zuliya shɛŋa m-pahi
vector-language-redirect-to-top: Zuliya maa  zaŋ goli taba maa zaa bela paaji maa zuɣusaa zaŋ sheei na ka che di taachi maa
vector-anon-user-menu-pages: Sabbu yaɣa zaŋ ti mali niŋ nima ban yi maliniŋ kpanjɔri ni
vector-anon-user-menu-pages-label: Bɔhima pam pahi zaŋ jɛndi maliniŋ
vector-toc-collapsible-button-label: Cham gili yaɣayaɣa ŋan be teebuli maa puuni
vector-limited-width-toggle-on-popup: A taɣila a yulibu yaɣili chaŋ yɛliŋ maa zaa.a yi bɔri ni yi ŋa puuni labi yaɣili bela yulibu polo nyin dihimi  kpe
vector-limited-width-toggle-off-popup: A ni tooi yi bɛla bee palibu yulibu ni di yi niŋ ka a yi dihi kpe.
vector-prefs-limited-width: Yoomi soli din dii bɛ galisi yaɣili maa
vector-prefs-limited-width-help: Yoomi soli din dii bɛ galisi maa din yɛn sɔŋ ka karimbu tooi kpaŋsi
empty-language-selector-body: Paaji maa yaɣa maa bɛ saɣi dee zuliya nima zaa
vector-toc-unpinned-popup: Yaɣayaɣa teebuli pubupubu nyɛla din yihi kpe
vector-page-tools-unpinned-popup: Tuma binyahiri kpanjɔɣu maa nyɛla din yi kpe
vector-main-menu-unpinned-popup: Maŋmaŋa nyɛla bɛni. yihi shɛli kpe
vector-readability-survey-description: Wula ka sabbu ŋan be wikipedia viɛli ti a? Zaŋmi binyɛra ŋan doya ŋɔ n mali dini dɔya shɛm.  Deemi baŋsim pam zaŋ chaŋ ŋa polo [[mw:Special:MyLanguage/Reading/Web/Accessibility for reading|Accessibility for reading project]]
vector-readability-survey-optout: Dihimi tuɣima ka di sɔŋ ka a too talinti na a buɣisigu  ka tooi zaŋ a tɛhi ni nyɛ shɛli n wuhi salo lai ŋan pahi ŋɔ ni. [[#close-vector-survey|Remove this tool]].
